detectors.description:
Reentrancy in Staking.redeem() (buggy_42.sol#225-234):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(token.transfer(msg.sender,staker[msg.sender].tokens)) (buggy_42.sol#229)
	- require(bool)(token.transferFrom(owner,msg.sender,staker[msg.sender].tokens * stakePercentage * 100 / 10000)) (buggy_42.sol#230)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- Staking.staker (buggy_42.sol#192) in staker[msg.sender].redeem = true (buggy_42.sol#232)
	- Staking.staker (buggy_42.sol#192) in staker[msg.sender].tokens = 0 (buggy_42.sol#233)
detectors.markdown:
Reentrancy in [Staking.redeem()](buggy_42.sol#L225-L234):
	External calls:
	- [require(bool)(token.transfer(msg.sender,staker[msg.sender].tokens))](buggy_42.sol#L229)
	- [require(bool)(token.transferFrom(owner,msg.sender,staker[msg.sender].tokens * stakePercentage * 100 / 10000))](buggy_42.sol#L230)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- [Staking.staker](buggy_42.sol#L192) in [staker[msg.sender].redeem = true](buggy_42.sol#L232)
	- [Staking.staker](buggy_42.sol#L192) in [staker[msg.sender].tokens = 0](buggy_42.sol#L233)

detectors.description:
Reentrancy in Staking.startStaking() (buggy_42.sol#209-215):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(token.transferFrom(msg.sender,address(this),stakeTokens + findOnePercent(stakeTokens))) (buggy_42.sol#211)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- Staking.staker (buggy_42.sol#192) in staker[msg.sender].time = now (buggy_42.sol#212)
	- Staking.staker (buggy_42.sol#192) in staker[msg.sender].tokens = staker[msg.sender].tokens + stakeTokens (buggy_42.sol#213)

	External calls:
	- [require(bool)(token.transferFrom(msg.sender,address(this),stakeTokens + findOnePercent(stakeTokens)))](buggy_42.sol#L211)
